metadata.title: CVE-2020-8189 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description:
A cross-site scripting error in Nextcloud Desktop client 2.6.4 allowed topresent any html (including local links) when responding with invalid dataon the login attempt.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8189` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

caja-nextcloud - 3.0.1-3
dolphin-nextcloud - 3.0.1-3
libnextcloudsync0 - 3.0.1-3
nautilus-nextcloud - 3.0.1-3
nemo-nextcloud - 3.0.1-3
nextcloud-desktop - 3.0.1-3
nextcloud-desktop-cmd - 3.0.1-3
nextcloud-desktop-common - 3.0.1-3
nextcloud-desktop-l10n - 3.0.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.1-3').
